website_summaries.verdict: A natural "eye lift" for aging eye area with collagen-boosting ingredients.
pros: Natural formula boosts collagen with peptides
Hyaluronic acid delivers lightweight but potent hydration
cons: Doesn't target dark circles or under-eye puffiness

customer_reviews.title: Light & Smooth Serum Face Glows
customer_reviews.text: This works just as well as a $55 product from Image. I put on freshly washed damp face and then a pea sized drop of moisturizer across my entire face. It instantly locks in moisture and smooths out and plumps the skin. It's light, not greasy, quickly absorbed and feels great when dried. It seems to tighten a bit. Then I put on my foundation on with a brush.
customer_reviews.author: Kim I. Murray

customer_reviews.title: The serum is lightweight and I like it better than the cream based eye moisturizers.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product a few months ago when I bought it over the counter in a retail store. I really like the first time I used it as it is lightweight and the price is reasonable. I noticed the difference in the skin around my eyes. I continued using it until I decided I will stick to this product as I see the improvement on the skin around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It didn't give me any benefits at all. Cheaper to use nothing then. But it is lightweight, doesn't smell bad, and didn't irritate the sensitive skin around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lora E Castilla

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Its good in terms of hydration, very fast to be absorbed by skin, and does not leave any oily feeling . I don't see any wrinkles reduction. But it might take time. Over all I like it
customer_reviews.author: Anaska

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Eye Serum!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely love this product! This is the first time that I’m using an eye serum, so I didn’t know what to expect. Even just within 2 weeks, I feel that the area under my eye is more hydrated and smoother. Would recommend this to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wang

customer_reviews.title: Pleased - has become a reordered product
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased with this eye serum. I use it once in the morning before a moisturizer and reordered it because of how soft + smooth my under eye area has become.
customer_reviews.author: Charmagne

customer_reviews.title: It feels nice on the skin, but that’s it :(
customer_reviews.text: The product has a very light feeling, but did nothing for my skin, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Best eye serum ever
customer_reviews.text: This eye serum reduces wrinkles and hydrates as well. I have used it for a while now and I really like the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work ok....not familiar with this type of product
customer_reviews.author: Sbri

customer_reviews.title: Skin care.
customer_reviews.text: Really love this use it all time worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle prebish

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: In 2 days I saw the difference in my eyes. Brighter, firm and less tired
customer_reviews.author: Kary

customer_reviews.title: Zero star
customer_reviews.text: Bottle was opened and it was way less than 0.5 oz. it’s probably used/returned product. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I don't know if I should be trust and use it
customer_reviews.text: the box was open and broken, the container does not have the security seal, I don't know if I should be trust and use it. But I use this product before and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Griselda

customer_reviews.title: A great eye product
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it made my eyes perk up and tighten the corners. Underneath my eyes were smooth also. I am over 60 and i just live this product. Have tried many and this one works.
customer_reviews.author: T. Freed

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this serum! I have extreme sensitive eyes and had no reactions from the serum. Because I have severe dry skin around my eyes, I have to apply 2 coats of this serum (after allowing the first to dry). I then apply my eye moisturizer and using less because of the moisture locked-in from the serum. I'm saving lots of money with less eye moisturizer (Lancome Progres, the absolute best)! The skin around my eyes looks tighter and my make-up stays put longer. I'm not having as many creases from my eye concealer as well. I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Dewybch

customer_reviews.title: Magic stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works like magic. I keep coming back for more. It has helped my skin improve. I am pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda  Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Product works very effective, best I ever tried
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and have great results. Really firms the under eye area, and just dissolves into the skin. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kindle reader

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I first found this in TJMAX. My skin improved significantly since I started using it. The pores appeared smaller and the skin glowed. Most importantly the ingredients are so healthy. Please don’t stop making it.
customer_reviews.author: BluUmbrlla

customer_reviews.title: Great product for reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. I stopped using for a few weeks and the difference was very noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen  preamble

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Its like a liquidy gel. I wear it under eye make up and works fine under the makeup. It doesn't peel as some gel products do.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: immediate results
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as well as more expensive serums. If my eyes are tired looking, this seems to plump up sagging and wrinkles. It is so reasonable, I also use it when touching up makeup during the day. i always have it on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Mayda Kale

customer_reviews.title: It's a clear thin moisturizing oil. It's  not  irritating  to  skin & I  have  VERY  SENSITIVE  SKIN
customer_reviews.text: It's very thin oil It doesn't seem to do anything. I might just not notice because I use it every morning. It's sheer colorless is feel watery no thick at all. I use it every morning because it's with morning meds. I think it's too expensive for the ammount. It must be doing it's job. It feels good to put it on because it's not thick,It's totally clear/ sheer, I'm not looking for a miracle. I'm not impressed enough to buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fun One

product_meta.title: Dermapeutics Hyaluronic Acid Serum for Eyes, 0.5 oz | Ultra Hydrating | Anti Aging & Anti Wrinkle | Skin Firming & Plumping | Boosts Collagen & Elastin
product_meta.description: Maximum moisture is achieved with this very high concentrate of hyaluronic acid in DERMAPEUTICS HYALURONIC EYE LIFT SERUM! This clinical grade formula is absorbed deep into the skin and adds up to 1000 times more moisture than water to the skin. The increased hydration not only smooths and plumps the skin to lessen the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles but also helps diminish sun damage. Use everyday before moisturizing. Massage a thin layer over face and neck. Start with a single drop, as more as needed.
feature_bullets: UNIQUE HYALURONIC ACID BLEND - Our Hyaluronic Eye Lift Serum is composed of the highest quality ingredients and uses the most state of the art technology to maximize its effectiveness in diminishing fine lines and wrinkles while nourishing the skin under the eyes. No parabens, dyes or fragrances.

ULTRA REPAIR HYDRATION & MOISTURE - A clinical grade formula that adds 1,000 times more moisture to the delicate skin around the eyes than water, which leaves your complexion looking healthy and bright. Safe for all skin types.

HELPS EYE FIRMING, DARK CIRLCES, & BAGS - Our unique blend of amino acids and peptides help firm and tighten the skin around the eye to diminish the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Not only does it smooth and plump the skin, but it also helps heal and soothe damaged skin.
RENEWS COLLAGEN & ELASTIN - Contains essential peptides to stimulate collagen production, maintain skin elasticity, and works as a potent antioxidant.

DERMAPEUTICS HYALURONIC EYE LIFT SERUM - Preferred by our customers! Compare to other hyaluronic acid serums, dark spot correctors and dark spot removers, airbrush makeup products, hydroquinone products, anti-aging face creams and microneedle roller products. Also, compare to brands like TruSkin, Skinceuticals, Pure Biology, InstaNatural, Cosmedica, Claire-ity, and Asterwood Naturals.
